channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Foundry -- UAA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Foundry -- UAA

item.title: CVE-2020-5402|2024-08-04T08:30:23.930Z -- cloud%20foundry -- uaa
item.description: In Cloud Foundry UAA, versions prior to 74.14.0, a CSRF vulnerability exists due to the OAuth2 state parameter not being checked in the callback function when authenticating with external identity providers.
